help_text:
Type `$status` to get the status of all FiveM server
Type `$players` to view who's playing on main the server
Type `$ip` to get the ip of the servers

offline: The military base started an intercontinental missile, therefor the server is offline
Well, I can't connect to it, so I guess it's offline
The police forces are chasing the server, it's now unavailable
It's offline because someone disconnected the power cable from the server: https://tenor.com/view/office-server-power-lady-unplug-gif-8220789
online: The server is up and running: https://tenor.com/view/server-runing-server-up-and-running-hamster-gif-17522250
Whoa I just traveled with lightspeed to check if the server is online, and guess what, it is.
loading: I'm still loading, but who would win https://tenor.com/view/loading-girls-fight-punch-gif-17408177
I'm getting everything ready, you can lean back
Travelling beyond time and space, this can take some time
players: There are currently {} of {} players online
